content.detailedDescription: Stepped outside and noticed a bright orb to my left (generally north). it was bright blue/red and seemed to be flashing/glowing constantly. shimmering like a star but much brighter. it was about moving west slowly while shimmering blue/red for 5 seconds then would hover for 3 seconds and flash white before continuing on. it made a couple strong directional changes that were rather fast, but the longer we watched it the less direction change it assumed. it switched from east to west and back about four times before heading west completely. then a helicopter showed up apparently moving towards the light and from there the light seemed to move south towards where i was, in the street. it continued to shimmer/flash and as what appeared to be the helicopter went north instead moving towards it, the light began to move east. once it was about parallel with 71st ne avenue but very far north, it began heading north and slowly fell out of the distance. it was fully bright and emanating light the whole time.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright orb moved sequentially from east to west, then north.

content.detailedDescription:
I drove down from minneapolis to visit friends in britt, ia. during the course of my visit the blood moon was taking place so we sat in lawn chairs in someone's front yard to watch the event.  the yard we were in was on the northwest edge of town so there were open farm fields to the north and the west of where we were sitting with the small town of britt to the east and south of us.  the eclipse of the moon was in itself a mysterious event and having seen many ufos myself in minnesota over the years i was leery that the blood moon may be trigger another event somehow.

it's interesting to note that i had mentioned to the other people i was with that i was fearful that there may be a ufo event because there was an eeriness in the air that night.  the two different families from britt that i was with both mentioned that they had witnessed triangular ufos in the area recently.  the owner of the house we were at said that two years ago a triangular ufo hovered over the field just north of her house for over two hours.  she, her family and the other family from britt who was there had seen some triangular ufos when they were camping in july, 2015 (two months earlier) in crystal lake, ia.

on the night of the blood moon, we were focused on the progress of the eclipse and right before the moon was almost completed covered, i noticed several flashes of light in front of the moon that resembled flashes from cameras going off at the same time.  a few seconds later an object appeared from the east (which is the same direction we were looking at the moon).  it was heading right for us and was approximately 100 yards above the tree tops.  it didn't look like an airplane, for one thing is that it was absolutely silent.  as it approached us we could see that it was triangular in shape with several white lights on the edge with one red and one green light flashing.  

as this first ufo was fast approaching us, a second identical triangular ufo appeared from nowhere just south of the first object and took off to the north at a high rate of speed toward the first object.  we thought the second object was going to collide with the first object as the second one accelerated at a high rate of speed and just missed the first object but what seemed like inches.

the first object then went right over our heads and the seven of us were able to tell that it was a solid, triangular shaped object.  the first object then moved over the town of britt and stopped about 5-6 miles out of town to the northwest where it hovered in place for a couple hours.  the second object moved over the town of britt and stopped about 5-6 miles out of town to the northeast and hovered in place for hours.  the first and second ufos appeared between 9:30 and 10pm.  around 10:30pm, a third triangular ufo appeared from nowhere in the east and moved over britt until it reached the hovering first object.  once it reached the first object, it hovered n place about 100 yards above the first object.  the two objects hovered close to each other for awhile until the first object finally became moving to the west and eventually floated out of sight.

the second object that was hovering 5-6 miles in the northeast part of town was joined by a fourth triangular object that showed up from nowhere and hovered near the second object.  between 9:30 pm and 2am we counted at least 14 triangular ufos appearing and hovering over and around britt.  we took a break for a half hour around midnight and eventually went to bed at 2am so it's possible that there were more than 14 ufos because new objects kept appearing all night long and were still active when we went to bed.

we took pictures and a video of the objects but it's interesting to note that the second object that was still hovering to the northeast when we went to bed at 2am wouldn't let us take its picture.  it was much brighter than the stars but when we took pictures of that particular ufo, only the fainter stars showed up but the ufo didn't.

we were wondering if these objects had come for us because it didn't make sense why they were hovering outside of britt.  there are no military installations there and it's a farming community. the closest airport is a regional airport in mason city, ia which is 30 miles away.  what did they want?  interestingly, my friend and i were afraid to go to bed because we may not wake up or may wake up with unexplained injuries.  it should be noted, however, that when we did wake up the next morning we had unexplained pains that appeared after we went to bed.  his pain was in his back.  for me, i had a pain that ran from my hip all the way down to the back of my left knee.  i needed to see my chiropractor every other day for the next two weeks to cure the mysterious injury to l3 in my back.  my chiropractor was perplexed and asked if i had done anything unusual because my back issues were in a place that we've never needed to adjust before.

in july, 2015 my same group of friends i was visiting in britt, ia had gone camping in crystal lake, ia and had a close range encounter with one of these same triangular shaped ufos.  i asked if anything unusual resulted from the encounter and my friend mentioned that the next morning both batteries on his bus were completely dead.  the bus had always started no problem before this night and after charging the batteries has had no problems since.  no dome lights were left on that could have drained the batteries because they would have noticed they had left their lights on since they were sleeping in the bus.

also in 2015, there were reports that all the fish and algae in crystal lake (crystal lake, ia) were killed and nobody has had an explanation as to why.  now crystal lake is the clearest it's ever been and it's easy now to see the bottom of the lake. there have also been posts on facebook lately that people in storm lake, ia have been witnessing these same triangular shaped ufos.  storm lake is less than 60 miles west of britt and it's interesting to note that many of the triangular shaped ufos we saw in britt moved through town and continued west, perhaps on their way to storm lake.

my friend from britt visited me in minneapolis a week later and we were listening to music when suddenly two of my five cd changers both stopped working at exactly the same time.  we used a different cd player to listen to a new cd but the new cd stuck on one song.  at that point i went outside on my deck and saw the same triangular object moving away from my part of town.  that object was about three miles south of my house and was moving west.  interestingly, since then my friend from britt was at my house again and we watched a sphere shaped ufo appear in the northwest and move to the southeast over the city of minneapolis when suddenly it imploded and disappeared in mid-air.  this same friend also texted me last saturday (october 10) that he was watching another triangular ufo hovering 5-6 miles to the northeast of britt, ia again.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Triangular ufos appeared in northern iowa during the blood moon

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
On 10-12-2015!
as i was going outside. i spotted this large object in the west. it was bright. it seemed to have lots of lights. 
it seemed as if it hovered in mid air for less than 5 minutes. then it slowly moved over our area where i live. what i could see of it. it looked triangle shaped.
as it went over. i noticed it had no sound. 

i have somewhat a picture of something else that came through after that thing did. and went the same direction. we have no clue what it was. this thing had no sound either.  
it seems like the more i been watching the sky. the more things i see. that i have no clue what they are. the objects i spot happen usually between 8 pm to 10 pm.
content.summary: Watched a large object hovering in the west. what seemed bigger than a plane. with lots of lights.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i went out to the woods to the very top of one of the peaks to view the eclipse of the moon last month. (september 27 2015) we didn't actually see anything at the time. in fact when i looked up in the sky to take the photo with my cell phone, the only thing i saw up there was the moon and a whole bunch of stars. no ambient light where we were. that's why we chose the spot we went to. but i caught something in the first photo i took. in the next shot which was taken one second after the first, there is nothing but the moon and stars. and how i feel about it is that i wish they would land and stand before us already!
content.summary: The event was found out the next day when viewing the photos taken of the moon durring the eclipse last month. i cought something in the first photo i took of the moon. in the next shot taken 1 second later, it is gone.

content.detailedDescription: On the night of october 7, 2015 while traveling through michigan's upper peninsula, just outside of ishpeming, mi, i observed a glowing yellow light in the southern sky just above the tree line. i mentioned this to my driving companion and he remarked that he thought it was the glow of my cigarette on the inside of the windshield. we quickly deduced it wasn't a light from inside the truck due to the light crossing over the road in front of us heading toward the north sky. i watched as the light, now in the north sky began traveling east. we stopped and exited the vehicle it was at this time we both noticed multiple, now small star like, blinking objects moving curiously in mostly the southwestern sky. randomly, the objects would cease their blinking and become continuous lights. binoculars were taken from the truck and though all the object's lights could be seen the shape could not be determined. two of the objects, which had moved into the west sky, made fast 90 degree turns and one turned quickly and flew over us. they seemed lower than a commercial jet's altitude. the object which had crossed overhead then turned and headed back to the south sky where it came to a sudden halt in the sky and changed it's color into a golden yellow and it's brightness intensified. eventually all the objects moved out of sight and after a few more moments we could no longer see any of the objects.
content.summary: Multiple starlike objects which changed color and brightness while quickly changing direction

content.detailedDescription: Standing outside clear night flashing my 1000lm flashlight at the sky when a star like light started moving from a hover, after first disappear another one started moving disappears light started to fade.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Looked up in clear sky flashing my 1000lm flashlight then a star like light started moving both light started moving away then just got dimmer and moved direction, i have 2 witness.

content.detailedDescription: I was laying out on my lounge chair on the deck at my house in marysville, i saw what looked like a glass spaceship , clingon shape , go over my house , i jumped up out of the chair to watch it,  there's a tree that was blocking the moon , and when it went into the light of the moon it was gone so that's why i suspect it was a cloaked machine of some sort no sound.! i ran up and told my daughter who was inside the house what i'd seen she  thought i was silly. i went back outside hoping it  might comeback, and as i laid there something blew on my forhead to a  pinpoint blow i don't know why, scared me to death went in the house  and shut the door .
content.summary: I was star gazing, it went right over my house, glass like, cloacked like, shape like a clingon no joke

content.detailedDescription: I was six years old in 1979, and i was in bed approx 9 pm. at approx 2-am a bright light flashed through the window and the next thing i know i was being lifted by a bright beam of light and was lifted up out a a window that was securely closed and shut. i knew it wasn't normal and i didn't know anything about ufo's and i knew something was taking me up into the sky. i felt scared and i thought i was never going to go back home. i tried to look back at my sister and ask her for help but i was paralyzed. i felt helpless. i went blank and woke up in a bed, in a pod with a filmy waxy, rubber cover. i tore open the cover, i felt like there was no gravity, floating, i looked around and seen many other pods. i could see other beings inside the pods. i grabbed onto the edge of this pod, and everything went black. when i did wake up i was very sick and taken to the hospital because i was throwing up and had a fever over 100. i was diagnosed with pneumonia and kept in the hospital for approx 3 weeks. there is no explanation for this event that happened to me. i feel that this event has effected me to the present day. i believe i would have to undergo hypnosis or something to this effect to actually remember. thank you and please help me.
content.summary: Pulled into craft, many pods in vision, broke out of pod, and put back in bed

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I went outside early morning on the 15th of september 2015 after my husband left for work, i was sitting on the stairwell smoking a cigarette looking up at the sky in front of me i began to feel strange like i was being watched so i got up to go inside when i turned around i saw this huge looking light object hovering in the sky. i went inside and grabbed my cell phone to take some photos. the object was there for an hour and a half. when day light hit i went inside when i came back out i could not see it. the photos i took were interesting to say the least..
content.summary: It was bright with a changing structure gave off light like welders arc

content.detailedDescription:
A sunday night, 2 weeks ago, around 8:20 pm i stepped out on my third floor deck to enjoy the cool fall evening. it was just turning dusk and the stars were not shining that bright yet. my deck faces east and as i glanced to the
left, which is north, i noticed a white cloud very low just over the tree tops. there was little wind but the cloud was moving very slowly which seemed odd. as it came closer it changed shape into a v shaped craft, dark grey in color.

there were no lights and it had the faint sound of the wind as it moved to
the south.  it was maybe 10' above me when it was directly in front of me.
the image as it appeared was one of mass, very large, maybe 50 to 75 feet
across. it was so close that i couldn't make out the whole of it, just the wings. i kept thinking am i really experiencing this.  i knew it was a ufo,
but it was still hard to believe what i was seeing.

i didn't move, just stood mesmerized that this was happening.  it slowly
moved out of in front of me gliding south and as i watched it go over another tree it changed shape again into a cloud and disappeared over the tree.  the whole thing was surreal.  i thought to myself that i needed to
go in and draw a picture of it before it faded from my mind.  when i did that it was easier to accept that it actually happened and i did see it.
once in a life time i think.
content.summary: What first appeared as a white cloud moving changed shape into a v shaped ufo right above my deck.

content.detailedDescription:
Was on a photo shoot. observed very high up what appeared to be a jetliner.
had a 700mm telephoto lens on and photographed the object.
upon checking and magnifying the file on my computer, i found that it did
not appear like a regular aircraft. the object was very high, therefore,
not the best quality to look at, however, enough to be able to have an idea
of what it may be. (photo attached)
content.summary: Looked tubular, white and shiny

content.detailedDescription:
my brother and i were heading eastbound on us 2, on the outskirts of st. ignace, michigan. it was sunrise last saturday morning, october 10th, 2015. it was a beautiful sunrise with very few clouds other than right at the horizon. i am driving and notice a single boomerang shaped object at about the ten o'clock position. it was not crisp and clean but seemed to me "fuzzy" like seeing something a bit out of focus. it was very difficult to say how far it was away from us as there weren't any clouds remotely close to it.

i pointed it out to my bother and asked him "what is that?" and his reply was immediate and clear "that's a ufo."

we observed this unidentified object for a couple of minutes and then lost sight of it temporarily as we dipped behind a row of trees. we had lost sight of it for less than 30 seconds and as we came up out of the dip and out from behind those trees, we were amazed to see not just one object, but now two objects and each were identical to each other. fuzzy looking boomerang shaped objects, each exactly alike, at the exact altitude and appearing to be moving east towards canada over lake huron. looking at the "boomerang" shape, they would have been pointing upward with the top flattened out. they were dark in color as the sun was rising in the east.

we were now in the business community of st. ignace on us 2, with my brother telling me to stop and take a photo of the phenomenon. i told him we were almost to the big boy restaurant and i would when we got into their parking lot. about a half a minute later i pulled into the parking lot as we watched these two objects disappear moving east south east. they had to be moving a very high rate to disappear in the distance so quickly. it just was difficult to judge as there was nothing to reference their speed moving away from us nor to actually know the exact size of each object.

now of course, i wish i had listened to my brother pulled over and got my camera out. but i really didn't want to take my eyes off to what we were seeing and i misjudged the time we actually had to see them.

nothing in my experience gives me a "logical" explanation to what we saw.  

kim d. joki
ishpeming, michigan
content.summary: While driving east, i looked up to see an one object, lost sight for 30 seconds and then there were 2 objects.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were driving south from winters, ca all of a sudden at about a 40 degree angel sitting in out vehicle we see this green orb fall from the sky. it flashed multiple times as it seemed to be falling. it was a pretty bright green light, it was traveling fast in speed it started at a south by south east direction and moved more south it went a few seconds and then turned off right back on and did that two other times. and then it seemed to either hit the ground or just disappeared.
content.summary: Driving south from a wedding in winters, ca

content.detailedDescription: I went outside to get some air.Looking up at the stars isaw one moving slowly to the north,then another moving south directly at the other.Just before they met ,they both made a right angle turn together flying parallel to each other to the east until i could no longer see them.I knew that they were not airplanes .They were silent and had no visual running lights.One by one, 6 more objects like the first two, came into view from all directions. all were doing manuvers together,moving left right,up down and rolling,where the light would disappear then reappear.This went on for about 30 minutes .All the while with not a sound.The first 2 joined the others coming back on the same plane they left on.After a while,maybe twenty minutes or so ,they all left in diferent directions ,one by one.But not all at ..Most of the action was almost overhead.I knew what i saw were ufos because of how they moved silently with no sound and right angle turns.I was overjoyed ,i have ,in the past ,viewed ufos one at a time.
content.summary: 2 to 8 objects silently flying various manuvers,all directions ,light woud go out when they rolled ,then appear again.1i

content.detailedDescription:
I woke up went outside (backyard) to have a cigarette. the time was exactly 615am (looked at clock after i saw the light). i was looking high into the dark early morning sky at the stars, and after a few seconds, i saw a light, slightly bigger than the largest star i could see at that time. this light was stationary, and came from a point where there was no star, got extremely bright and faded out all within one second very similar to seeing an explosion far off in space. when it went out, i looked at the time and it was 615am exactly and noticed that the spot i saw the light, was completely dark just like it was before it appeared. 

don't know if it was a ufo, some kind of explosion in space, an impact of two asteroids, a super nova or anything of that likeness, but i did see it and never have before or after that time. 

please let me know your opinion what you think it might have been. sorry, i wish i had more.

thank you.

ty shank
content.summary: Light in the early morning starlight sky appeared for only a second like an explosion

content.detailedDescription: I was at golden gardens park on tuesday night.As i exited a building the first thing i saw was a brite , orange-yellow object in the sky . i was facing n. it was headed se. there was an "envelope" of dim,white light surrounding the object. not circular or rectangular , but almost trapezoidal.The edges of the white light were even,not jagged, and it was dim , transparent. the orb itself was spherical with fuzzy edges. it was orange-yellow in color , and kind of flickering , pulsating as it traveled in a straight line .It made no noise and seemed to be at about the same altitude as jetliners that pass by from seatac airport. and about the same size as a jetliner.It passed over-head and the building blocked it from view so i moved 20 yards or so until i could see it again.It continued se until it disappeared on the horizon.The whole episode took less than a minute .
content.summary: As i exited building i noticed an orange object in the sky. it was coming towards seattle from the n . it had an aura of dim ,white ight that surrounded it.

content.detailedDescription:
8:53 pm  brady richardson and i were headed back to the office.  leaving brady’s house headed west.  i saw the bright light coming from the north.  it flashed twice within a 10 second period.  each time the burst lasted less than one second.

8:58 pm  as we were driving in a westerly direction, there was a small clearing we passed and i saw the burst of light coming from what looked like the back of a large series of cumulus clouds….   i can point out the location (it looks like it was in the direction of dodger stadium….  again, it happened twice, same pattern.
content.summary: Unusual flash of light from the north almost like a beacon, but in the clouds.

content.detailedDescription: 8:32 pm  i was at carson and main streets at the time.  facing south at the stop light.  lights coming from the direction of the torrance airport (from my view) were a series of lights (8 in all), reddish orange in color, small in size (a little larger than a normal small plane’s light).  no flickering at all in the lights.  their movements were in a ene direction at about 200 – 250 knots.  altitude:  approximately 1,500 to 2,000 ft.  i saw the lights for a period of 45 seconds then they all, one by one, looked like the lights were covered up.  other option on the lights were that they were forward facing and when they went overhead, they stopped showing because the objects were now flying away from my present location.
content.summary: Saw unusual lights from objects that made no sound.

content.detailedDescription: See above discription. my iphone was unable to pick up the object
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Object seemed to rotate giving an appearance of shape changing. shape was an obtuse v or boomerang.   elevation changed constantly up and down within 50 ft or so.

content.detailedDescription:
In late august of 1975, my father was in the air force and our family was getting ready to leave for a 3-year assignment to italy on september 3rd. we were in virginia visiting my father's family before leaving the country. my grandparents lived in a subdivision outside of the town of colonial beach called placid bay estates. one night, my 13-year old cousin, my 9-year old sister, and myself went for a walk. i was 11 at the time. it was a very clear night, and very quiet. i looked up at the stars at one point and saw a glowing red, sort of oval-shaped object silently cruising across the sky. it had white lights around the perimeter and they blinked, or flashed. the three of us stopped and watched it for a minute or two. i may have been a kid, but i had spent my whole life living on air force bases, and i had never seen anything like that, and i didn't know of any aircraft that were completely silent. we lost sight of whatever it was when we all took off running back to my grandparent's house to tell the adults about what we had seen. nobody took us seriously, and were rather dismissive, to be honest. i remember just being kind of fascinated and awestruck by what i had see, but not particularly fearful. i have spent the last 40 years wondering if there were any other reported sighting from that time-frame. my sister doesn't remember too much about the incident, but she does remember it happening. my cousin passed away a couple of years ago, but he never really had much to say about it as an adult, other than that he "remembered seeing something." 

i feel that i've never been taken very seriously about this due to how young i was at the time, but i have an extremely detailed memory of my early years and feel very confident that we did see exactly what i've described.
content.summary: Witnessed ufo in summer of 1975

content.detailedDescription: I was just relaxing in my backyard looking up in the sky saw what looked like a seeningly strange shadow. i noticed it because i was staring at the sky for quite sometime and just watching the clouds slowly move. i literally did not think of anything else but a shadow with extreme accurate shape of a straight line. the object was just and seems to be hovering along with the clouds. the shadow has three straight lines that made it shape like a triangle. after seeing this made me wonder what could caused this and thought to myself maybe a tall building near me was just casting this shadow but then again there was no building that more 250 ft tall in atleast in the 4 mile radius of where i was at and the nearest one is 20 miles away at downtown la. the object just slowly moved away alongsith the clouds in the horizon.
content.summary: Straight shadow lines in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I take my dogs out every morning between 5:15 and 5:30 am and while they do their thing, i look up at the stars.  i often see meteors and even the iss and satellites a few times. this morning i looked up and coming from north i see two big glowing whitish orbs zooming through the sky heading south, then they even seemed to be racing each other, with one getting ahead of the other and so on, this went on as they passed over me, a hair east of the big dipper, and kept going south until they were out of my view. they were very, very high and going quite fast. i have no idea what it was, so i found this site in hopes that someone saw the same event. i was terrified by it, but it was amazing to see. i was very startled and just stood out there for a while,  hoping it would happen again, but i didn't see them again. i did see a small meteor streak by a few minutes after, but that streak went east to west and those are a common sight to me. i also saw a small airplane flashing, also a common sight.  what i saw was not common or like anything i have ever witnessed.
content.summary: Cape coral fl two whitish orbs chasing each other from north to south direction

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was on my way home from my friends house. he lives around a school names magregor elementry. and it was late outside, but it was around that time to go home because i had school the next day. but i was on garfield ave. and i see something moving while i was riding my bike. so i stop and look at it and it keeps moving. i felt like i was being watched so i took a different route to my house in fear. it hovered and stopped at certain parts of the sky, but nothing iv ever seen before. it looked like a star but i know for a fact it wasnt due to its movement.And i saw a airplane sec. later. so i could tell the difference between them. keep your eyes on the sky!
content.summary: I have been looking to the sky's lately. i look up for a couple of min. and i can point out things that look like stars but move and look as it was hovering. sometimes i feel fear when i see them. i seem to see a lot of strange lights lately.

content.detailedDescription: I was chaining up my dog when i noticed a bright light to the east about the size of a large bright star. the object was unseen but there was an oval light that disappeared shortly after i noticed it. did not appear to move just vanished. i often look at the stars and i am a ufo buff and star gazer. i used my star app on my phone and no name was projected over anomalies location. i happen to get a picture with my phone. may have been a star event but i don't think so. i also saw a shooting star to the north so i know the difference.
content.summary: Oval light like a star but it disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I wrote it in short description thats it dont get anal about it call me il give full details its was my first sighting iv had 1 since around 2006 after the salina air show 6 or 7 cruising lights in a strait line formation whouch chanded into a perfect circle and whent back to strait and desapeared into the distance around 60 or 70 thou roughly
content.summary: 10 or 12 lights in triangle shape apear for 10 or 15sec over 40thou feet

content.detailedDescription: Was watching tv from an appartment downtown honolulu with windows facing north and west of oahu. was previously looking out the west-ward window enjoying the sunset. after it set i saw what i thought was a bright star despite not seeing any other stars in the sky from my position. then my wife and i noticed that this star was twinkling with blue-green-red-white patterns at random. we wanted to believe that it was a aircraft warning light given its completely stationary position. however given its position above the horizon and random pattern of color flashes it clearly was not a aircraft warning light. our next thought was a star. however we've never seen a star that twinkles multiple colors stationary in the sky and then just "fades to black" into nothingness after about an hour. we've been looking out this window in the west-ward direction of oahu since we've moved into the building about 2 weeks ago. the light seemed to be off in a distance (likely above ewa). never once have we seen any stars in the position in which the sighting took place. there have been many planes however which are clearly obvious with 2 tone light patterns and one even flew in the same field of vision at the same time as the unidentified random light twinkling. it was clearly not a plane. as mutual skeptics..My wife & i are completely perplexed on what exactly it is we saw. it was not a drone, airplane, or aircraft warning light.
content.summary: 4 color twinkling light that was as stationary as a star above the horizon not native to the landscape or skyline. just disappeared after approximately 45 minutes.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving my car south along aviation blvd. toward hermosa beach when all of a sudden a huge flash of light occurred to the west of me.  a few seconds later another flash of light occurred from same direction.  several cars driving along aviation blvd. slowed down.  as i drove into hermosa beach nearing prospect ave. i noticed that all of the electricity was out in hermosa north of aviation in the direction of the large flash.  i noticed a police car with flashing lights at corner of prospect and aviation.  i drove further south on aviation and it was very dark - all the street lights and business lights were out.  i turned left onto ocean ave. and then left again onto 10th street.  i pulled into our driveway and went in the house and mentioned the flashing lights to my son.  he mentioned that he and a friend had seen them a few nights earlier.  we then decided to drive over to where the flashing lights were.  we drove up aviation and took a left on prospect and observed the flashing light higher in the sky and further north about every 20-30 seconds.  we decided to follow the flashes to see if we could find the source.  we drove north on prospect, then the flash moved east so we took a right on artesia blvd. and then left on meadows ave.  the flashes were huge in the sky and appeared to be moving north and at a distance of about a mile. we drove meadows ave following the flashes until marine, then turned left on marine and right onto pacific coast hwy.  the flash looked like it might be above the chevron plant, but when we drove into el segundo the flash appeared right above lax.  the flash then appeared to be north of lax.  we turned left on imperial to see if the flash might move above ocean toward the west; however didn't see it as we drove west.  we did a u-turn on imperial and headed east and turned right and headed south on pacific coast hwy.  by that time it was 10pm and we had seen the flash occur at least 40 times in the past hour.  we stopped at a restaurant in manhattan beach and then headed home and as we drove onto 10th street  in hermosa driving east we saw the flash again high up in the sky multiple times looking east.
content.distance: 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.summary: Hugh flashes of light over hermosa beach then traveled north past lax then se

content.detailedDescription: Was going for an evening exercise walk through neighborhood at about 9:10pm.  when i was heading south back to my street, i noticed a bright green light in the sky that was moving quickly like a helicopter.  i waited to se if there was a sound or a search light and there was nothing.  i kept my eyes on it as i was continuing to walk south and noticed the light going to the right, then stopping, going up, then stopping, going down, then stopping.  it continued going a little right, a little left, a little up, a little down and then moving forward getting closer to my area.  the green light was getting brighter, and it was impossible to see a shape because of the distance.  i continued to go toward my house and would lose sight for a few seconds as the top of the houses and trees blocked my view until i was able to see it again in between the houses.  i arrived at my house and could see it there so i went in and grabbed my iphone to record it.  i went into my yard and started recording, but even with the zoom, i wouldn't get anything close enough to make out a shape.  the color and movement can clearly be seen.  i was trying to get my wife to come downstairs and see it, so i had to stop the recording and go in and get her.  when i came back out with her, it changed to a flashing red and silver color and started dropping.  i was able to record a portion of that and then it got too low behind the tree line from my neighbor.  i kept the camera going in case it reappeared and it didn't.  i went back in front of the house since there is a better view and i saw it again, but now it was all red and it was much farther away, south and a little east.  i could still see the same movements, but it was too far to record.  as of an hour after my first seeing it, it was still out there but farther and a different color.  we are in the flight path of fighter jets that come from luke air force base.  i was expecting to see them fly by if this had been reported, and didn't see them until about :30 minutes later, but they were staying away from the area.  in the first video i took, i tried to keep my phone still so you can see that the movement is from the lights, not my hand.  the bright lit up area on the lower portion of the video is the upstairs bedroom light from my neighbor.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Bright green light, various direction change, hovering, color changed to red/silver started flashing

content.detailedDescription: I was walking to my car at 12:13am and saw a very bright star. then it did a c shape in the sky and faded out. it was bright and looked close to earth. i was at a lost for words and was stunned.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: I thought it was a bright star but it did a sudden jay turn and then faded into the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
October 14, 2015 

8:00pm mst

south of grande prairie, alberta, canada, north side of the wapiti river at the canfor haul road bridge at gold creek.


  my nephew and i were fishing on the north side of the wapiti river, at the canfor haul road bridge at gold creek. we were on the west side of the bridge. it was dusk, right before 8:00pm, about 25 minutes after the sun had gone behind the horizon, but was still light enough to see clearly for a few more minute. the stars were just starting to be visible in the sky. there were a couple small, high cirrus clouds to the southeast.

  i was looking directly south from where we were fishing, about 60 feet from the west side of the bridge. above the river bank, at about the same elevation as the first stars that were appearing, i seen a bright white light moving in the sky. i'd say i was looking up about 30-35 degrees.  i could tell it was not a plane immediately. it was brighter than the stars and moving closer to us, heading east-northeast. it looked about the same size as a star at first, but got larger as it got closer. 

  i pointed it out to my nephew and said "look, a ufo". 

  it was clearly at a lower elevation than large passenger jets or satellites fly at. i'd say around 10,000-15,000 feet. it did not leave a con-trail. as it got closer, three lights could be seen around the large central light, in an equilateral triangle. a bright white light beam was shining out of the lead small light that was at the front of the object, pointing in the objects direction of travel. the beam was about as long as the object and pointy like a needle, ending in a point not growing dimmer and fading, and  not widening like a search light or flash light. 

  none of the lights blinked or strobed like the marker lights on an airplane. the object was moving on a pretty straight course, heading generally east-northeast, at a constant speed. after a minute or two, it changed course a little, turning a little more north but still heading in a general east-northeast direction. the center light grew brighter, larger and changed color a few times from white to orange-red, to blue and green a few times when it changed course. 

  i said to my nephew "watch, there will be military jets here in two minutes."

  as soon as i said that, coming from the northwest was a military jet, followed a few seconds later by another identical jet. the roar of the jets was audible when they passed, and the wings and marking lights on the jets were clearly visible. the ufo looked nothing like the jets. the jets were heading on a intercept course with the object. the moment the jets appeared the ufo made it's slight course change. it continued to fly for a while heading east-northeast, but as the jets got close, the outside lights disappeared. the central light changed to red and slowly grew smaller and dimmer, and then disappeared, like it faded out. it didn't fly out of sight or into a cloud. it did not reappear. the jets changed course slightly, heading more south east after the object disappeared. we got in the vehicle and left right then.

  the light from the ufo didn't blink or flash at all, it just changed color. when it first changed direction and color, it switched from white to orangey-red and grew slightly larger and brighter for a brief instant, then seemed to change to red-orange then to blue-green, then red-orange, then white. they didn't look at all like the marker lights on a plane. from where we were, it looked smaller than the jets. the object moved at about the same speed and at the same altitude as the military jets. i could hear absolutely no sound from it, even though it was the same distance from us as the military jets, and we could hear them when the flew past us. 

  there was a small group of people partying on the south side of the river, on the east side of the bridge. i'm not sure if any of those people seen the ufo.
content.summary: Large central light, with three small lights surrounding it in a triangle, followed by military jets
